entry.title: Article Extract
entry.content:
Science&Technology

Economics

Psychology

How to get motivated even when you don’t feel like it

You’ve always aspired to be a professional artist. At last, this dream may become a reality, and you’re creating a portfolio to submit to art programs. But as the application deadline looms, you suddenly find yourself unmotivated, and avoiding the canvas altogether.

Why does motivation seem so fickle? And what even is it in the first place?

Psychologists define motivation as the desire or impetus to initiate and maintain a particular behavior. In other words, it’s the energy that drives you to do something. And knowing the source of that drive is particularly important when it comes to understanding how to maintain it.

These motivational forces generally fall into two broad categories: intrinsic and extrinsic. Intrinsic motivation is involved when you experience an activity as an end in itself. Take a hobby, like playing video games. The experience largely explains the desire to do it. Performing tasks that feel right in the moment or that you find a meaningful, interesting, or satisfying are driven by intrinsic motivation.

Extrinsic motivation, on the other hand, refers to pursuing a task as a means to an end. While few would consider going to the dentist as an enjoyable activity, you’re often motivated by the outcome of having clean, healthy teeth. Other examples of extrinsic motivation include completing a task to receive some sort of reward, whether it’s praise, power, or money. Notably, these rewards tend to come later, like receiving a bonus at the end of a quarter, or winning a competition after months of training. While extrinsic rewards, like getting paid, may seem appealing, their effectiveness can be surprisingly short-lived.

For example, a 2017 study found that those who were highly focused on the outcomes of their New Year’s resolutions or driven by extrinsic motivation weren’t the most likely to stick to them. What did predict persistence, however, was how much a person enjoyed pursuing their goals. In other words, you’re more likely to maintain an exercise routine if you take classes you enjoy, rather than just those that build your biceps.

Years of psychology research have shown that high levels of intrinsic motivation for school, a job, or an exercise class are more likely to keep you engaged in the long run. Day-to-day actions, though, are rarely either exclusively intrinsically motivated. Study for histroy exam, for example, can be intrinsically motivated if you’re curious about the culture of ancient Egypt. But extrinsic motivators may also be at play, as you aim to get good grade or feel pressure from family members to do well in school. But having multiple motivators isn’t always better.

One study of military cadets found that those who were driven both by intrinsic motivators, like self-improvement, and extrinsic motivators, like the outcome of getting a good job, were overall less motivated than cadets driven by just one of these factors. As a result, these cadets performed worse and were less likely to graduate. Psychologists call this phenomenon the overjustification effect, the idea that additional extrinsic motivators can actually muddy the waters when you already have the intrinsic drive to do something.

But this is only a problem if you already find a task motivating. When you’re faced with an activity you find tedious or uninteresing, adding extrinsic rewards can be beneficial. In this way, extrincis motivators can provide sufficient justification. While you may never enjoy doing the laundry, it may feel less daunting if you get praise from a loved one, or even promise yourself that you’ll watch your favorite TV show when you’re done folding.

Motication is complicated. And sometimes, no matter how passionate you are about a goal or hobby, finding the motivation to actually do it can be difficult. But there are things you can do to increase your drive, even when it feels impossible. Focus on building intrinsic motivation by making the task more fun in the moment. Asking a friend to join you or simply putting on your favorite playlist can give you the boost to get started and stick with your goals for the long haul.

entry.title: Approaches in Studying Effectively
entry.content:
3 Tips on How to Study Effectively

Forgetting is the friend of learning. -Robert Bjork

This approaches have great impacts on exam-oriented education, mostly have great impacts on memorizing knowledge.

The Theory of the way to transfer knowledge from short-term memory to long-term memory.

  • The repeated firing strengthens the connection between the neurous.
  • This transfers is crucial during sleep.
  • New knowledge is integrated with other related concepts you already know.

How

  • Testing yourself with flashcards and quizzes, forces you to actively retrieve knowledge, which updates and strengthens the memory.
    • Rereading textbooks and highlighting notes can generate a false sense of competence, since the information is right in front of you.
    • Testing yourself allows you to more accurately gauge what you actually know.
    • Making mistakes can actually improve learning in the long term.
    • It’s theorized that as you rack your brain for the answer, you activate relevant pieces of knowledge. The brain can better integrate this new information with what you already know after the correct answer is later revealed.

What

  • Mixing multiple topics and subjects, interleaving, or mixing the concepts you focus on in a single session, can lead to better retention than practicing a single skill.
    • Cycling through different subjects forces you brain to temporarily forget, then retrieve information, futher strengthen the memory.

When

  • Spacing your review across multiple days allows for rest and sleep between sessions.
    • While sleep, the brain is actively at work, storing and integrating knowledge in the neocortex.
    • Cramming the night before the exam may seem logical, the information won’t stick around for the long term.

Reference

  • 3 tips on how to study effectively

entry.title: C++语法查漏补缺
entry.content:
代码中的基础概念

命名空间

相当于给代码加一个”姓氏”, 避免不同库的同名函数冲突.

数据类型

除了C中的int, float, double, char以外, C++还可以通过auto自动识别变量类型.

类/结构体

类是一个自己定制的”数据类型说明书”, 有很多不同的属性和功能, 通过类来构建对象;

以手机为例

  • 每部手机具有颜色, 型号, 电量这些属性;
  • 手机都有充电, 打电话, 拍照这些功能;

当需要在类外部定义函数的时候, 用::

当这个类只需要提供一些数据, 并且默认可以访问的时候, 这个就是结构体

当需要表达一些状态或者模式选择的时候, 通常会用到枚举类enum class

在机器人中通常用于机器人控制状态管理

注意! 类的声明和使用必须在同一个命名空间中, 否则会出现找不到类的错误.

智能指针

传统的指针容易导致内存泄漏, C++中有三种智能指针, 可以实现内存自动释放;

  • unique_ptr
    • 唯一性
  • shared_ptr
    • 不同的指针共享同一数据
  • weak_ptr
    • 不能访问, 只能观察

数学运算

  • std:fmod(a, b)计算 a 除以 b 的余数
  • std::pow(-1.0, n)生成 -1 的 n 次方.
  • std::floor()确保结果是整数
  • std::cos()将弧度值转化为余弦波形;

Eigen库

  • 矩阵定义

矩阵主要分为两种

  • 固定矩阵: 编译时就会确定大小, 不发生改变
  • 动态矩阵: 运行时确定大小, 可以改变

矩阵赋值的时候会按行填充;

  • 特殊矩阵
  • 基本运算
  • 向量操作

  • 转置与逆

  • 访问与修改

条件判断

C++中常用try...catch作为异常处理机制, 用于捕获和处理程序运行中可能出现的错误, 例如网络中断, 文件不存在.

c++提供了标准异常(如 std::runtimeerror ), 推荐使用

异步编程

future机制是C++11引入的异步编程工具

核心组件:

  • std::future
    • 表示一个异步操作的未来结果, 通过get()方法获取结果, 若结果未就绪, 会阻塞当前线程, 可以通过.wait_for()来支持超时等待;
  • std::promise
    • 用于在异步任务中设置结果或异常;
  • std::async
    • 启动异步任务, 返回一个future对象, 常用std::launch::async来强制新线程执行;

entry.title: CAD设计技巧
entry.content:
CAD能力的提升在于不断的练习, 熟能生巧.

SolidWorks

Alt + T+Z可以打开自定义设置，设置鼠标笔势和快捷键。

鼠标笔势

将常用的命令分配到对应的鼠标笔势即可。

常用快捷键

  • 将正视于改为空格；

常用特征：
Q为拉伸凸台，W为拉伸切除；
E为旋转拉伸，R为旋转切除；

T为草图的智能尺寸；

草图中，右键能够选中封闭曲线；

常用草图:
A为中心线, S为中心圆;
D为中心矩形, F为对角矩形;
G为新建草图

装配体:
X为配合

UG

UG常用命令快捷键

  • Ctrl+J 编辑对象显示
    • 常用于修改对象的图层, 颜色, 透明度等;
  • Ctrl+E 表达式
    • 定义常量, 用于同个数据的多次标注或者函数表达式;
  • Ctrl+B 隐藏指定对象
  • Ctrl+Shift+B 反隐藏指定对象
  • Ctrl+Shift+U 显示全部对象
  • Ctrl+W 显示与隐藏
    • 可以单独设置每个对象的隐藏和反隐藏;
  • Ctrl+L 图层设置
    • 用于查看和设置对象的图层数, 并控制可见与不可见;
  • F8 定向
    • 通过旋转到临近的面来正视于;
  • Ctrl+F 适合窗口
    • 当不小心将零件放大缩小到不合适的尺寸的时候, 可以将其适配窗口大小;
  • F4 重复上一步操作步骤
  • Ctrl+S 保存
  • Ctrl+O 打开
  • Ctrl+N 新建

图层分类

按照规定的图层进行分类, 易于零件进行修改和展示;

最终实体 1
实体 11-20
草图 21-60
固定基准 61
基准 62-80
曲线 81-90
片体 91-110

快捷操作

在新建特征的时候, 窗口有确定和应用两个按钮, 可以通过鼠标中键快速应用和确定(点一次应用, 点两次确定, 确定后串口关闭);

entry.title: ESP32入门学习
entry.content:
🛠️开发环境搭建

Vscode PlatformIO

利用vscode platformIO搭建开发环境。

1. 将ESP32开发板连接到电脑上，打开设备管理器，查看端口号.

这里是COM5，如果没有显示端口号则需要安装驱动。

2. 新建工程文件夹（例如某个项目文件夹里面），在文件夹的环境中打开vscode(Shift+F10 在code环境中打开)，然后打开插件PlarformIO-(左下角)QUICK ACCESS-PIO HOME-Open

可以在Devices中查看到ESP32的端口号(左边栏)

也可以在Projects中打开其他工程文件夹

3. 新建项目，点击上图New Project，按照下图填上框架。

如果vscode没有打开文件夹，则可以在Project Wizzard最下面新建一个项目的文件夹和它的地址；

创建之后在src文件夹中会有一个main.cpp文件，代码就放在这个地方。

编译下载

在vscode左下角

点击左边的Build编译，点击右边的Upload下载。

📬ESP32串口通信

基础知识

串口是单片机常用的一种通信方式，通过两条线：TX和RX进行通信。

连接方式：一端的Tx接另外一端Rx，一端的Rx接另外一端Tx。

串口收发

发送

将ESP32与电脑连接（注意Tx和RX连接方式），利用TTL转USB模块连接。

ESP32有四个串口，分别是：Serial0、Serial1、Serial2、Serial3，一般不用Serial0，因为它用来烧录程序。

这里用Serial1向电脑发送指令，我们用串口调试助手来看效果。

SERIAL_8N1表示传输的一帧的帧格式，内容为8位数据位，无校验位，1位停止位。然后先设置Rx引脚，再设置Tx引脚。

我们需要在串口调试助手中选择好串口，设置波特率和帧格式，这里设置为115200，8N1。

烧录程序，打开串口

ESP32不断向电脑发送指令包，电脑不断接收并且显示出来。

接收

同样的连接方式。

通过LED灯来判断是否接收到数据。

电脑返回发送的数据：

当只发送”on”，则可以点亮LED，发送其他数据则关闭LED。

16进制数据收发

通常，我们在串口调试助手中发送的数据都是ASCII码，但是与传感器通信时通常都需要16进制的指令包。

因为一个字节等于两位16进制数，因此发送的时候以两位16进制为单位进行编码，16进制的编码格式：

如果需要计算校验和，一定要谨慎，校验和的计算很容易出错，计算时先把16进制全部转化为10进制，加起来再转换为16进制。

可以用在线的进制转换工具。

📮ESP32SPI通信

SPI 串行外设接口 (Serial Peripheral Interface) 是一种高速的，全双工，同步的通信总线。

ESP32集成了4个SPI控制器，分别是SPI0, SPI1, SPI2, SPI3，由于flash使用SPI0, SPI1，因此SPI2和SPI3是通用的SPI控制器，日常使用这两个SPI进行开发。

SPI2也叫HSPI，SPI3也叫VSPI。

使用默认的引脚，可以使用80MHz的时钟。

SPI2 (HSPI) SPI3 (VSPI) SPI Signal Description
13 23 MOSI 主设备输出，从设备输入
12 19 MISO 主设备输入，从设备输出
14 18 SCLK 时钟信号
15 5 SS 片选信号（用于从设备选择）

🦾ESP32输出PWM信号

ESP32的芯片中有专门用于脉宽调制（PWM）的模块, pwm信号在ESP32中有两个模块经常用到：

  • LEDc模块
    • 16个可用通道;
    • 8个可用定时器;
    • 频率范围从1Hz~40MHz;
    • PWM分别率从1位到16位;
  • MCPWM (Motor Control PWM)
    • 6个可用通道;
    • 内置死区控制, 用于电机控制的驱动H桥;
    • 包括捕获功能, 可以读取外部PWM信号的频率和占空比;
    • 主要用于复杂的电机控制;

LEDc模块

LEDc模块通常用于LED控制或者简单的电机控制; 关于为什么不用analogWrite(), 看看gpt怎么说:

参考资料: 深度ESP32 PWM教程如何在ESP32中使用PWM

常用的三个API:

  • ledcSetup(channel, frequence, resolution)
    • 设置的参数依次是通道, 频率, 分辨率;
  • ledcAttachPin(pin, channel)
    • 将GPIO与LEDc的通道绑定
  • ledcWrite(channel, Occupational cycle)
    • 输出pwm信号

代码示例(用于pwm控制电机)

需要根据电机的调速频率设置freq参数, 这里的电机调速范围是15-25kHz.

如果需要设置脉宽来控制电机或者舵机，可以使用函数：

对于常用的舵机SG90，其PWM信号的周期为20ms（控制频率为50Hz），占空比为0.5ms（0度）2.5ms（180度），在10位分辨率下，占空比为26128

🚦ESP32外部中断

可以通过配置某些引脚在其状态变化时，触发一个函数。

⚙️ESP32常用模块

超声波模块

以HC-SR04为例：

原理：

  1. 单片机给模块发送一个至少10us的高电平脉冲到Trig引脚（触发）。
  2. 模块接收到脉冲后会在Echo引脚（回声）发出一个高电平脉冲。
  3. 这个脉冲的持续时间就是声波从发出到反射回来的时间，通过测量声速往返的时间，便可以得到距离。

蓝牙模块

蓝牙模块使用的是<BLEDevice.h>这个库，通过一段示例代码，使得手机或者平板可以通过蓝牙设备搜索，以LED为信号，来尝试连接esp32;

UUID用于区分一个服务器中不同的服务和不同的特性，可以用UUID生成器（直接搜一个）来生成UUID;

在BLE中，有以下几个重要的概念：

  • BLE设备 (BLE Device):

    • 任何能够进行BLE通信的物理设备都可以被认为是一个BLE设备。这包括手机或平板或ESP32。

  • BLE服务器 (BLE Server):

    • 在BLE通信中，服务器是保存并提供数据的设备。服务器拥有一种称为“GATT (Generic Attribute Profile)”的数据结构，这个数据结构包含了这个服务器可以提供的所有数据。

  • BLE服务 (BLE Service):

    • 在GATT数据结构中，服务是一种组织数据的方式。每个服务都有一个唯一的UUID，以标识这个服务。服务包含了一组特性，每个特性都代表了一个数据点。

  • BLE特性 (BLE Characteristic):

    • 特性代表了一个数据点，例如一个传感器的读数或一个开关的状态。每个特性都有一个唯一的UUID，以标识这个特性。特性可以有不同的属性，例如可以读取、可以写入、可以通知等。

因此需要在代码中一步步创建以上四个对象。最后开始服务和开始广播，则可以在手机或者平板中找到对应的esp32设备进行连接。

WiFi模块

Esp32的WiFi模块有三种工作模式：

  • Wi-Fi Station
    • 作为网络的客户端，可以连接路由器与互联网交换数据；
  • Access Point
    • 作为一个“热点”，可以不需要路由器，其他设备连接Esp32与其交换数据；
  • Wi-Fi Station + Access Point
    • 两者功能兼具；

参考资料：ESP32 Useful Wi-Fi Library Functions (Arduino IDE)

Access Point

在AP模式下, 所有设备可以作为客户端与ESP32进行连接, 利用ESP32的Arduion框架中的WiFi.h, 然后通过设置wifi连接, 同时在代码种通过HTML来设计网页, 可以实现通过wifi网页控制ESP32, 或者控制机器人等.

示例代码, 通过wifi控制ESP32的led开关.

烧录代码后, 打开wifi连接, 选择如下图:

然后进入浏览器, 输入ip地址192.168.4.1, 得到以下画面.

可以进行led的控制了.

Mqtt通信

在PlatformIO中开发需要提前安装好PubSubClinet.h库；

关于Mqtt的基础知识，可以看这里：What is MQTT and How It Works

烧录代码到esp32中，这里连接了家里的wifi，并且订阅了节点test/led，通过树莓派订阅节点并且向borker发送消息即可点亮或者关闭led;

在树莓派中订阅topic并且发送消息

能观察到led的开关。

🪄常见问题

无法定位到库

在项目工程文件夹中platformio.ini中添加lib_deps = ESP32Servo，然后重新编译。

多个库的话，用空格隔开

无法烧录

  • 检查串口是否被占用，或者是否连接到错误的串口；
  • 检查ESP32的pin2是否外部输入高电平，如果是则无法烧录；

中断函数

中断函数很难用，一般情况下不要使用，而且不要在中断函数中用串口发送信息。

entry.title: Hexo部署Githubpages

设置Github密钥

github采用ssh加密的方式来推送代码, 推送的时候, git会匹配私钥(自己电脑里)和github上面的公钥是否配对, 若配对则认为你是合法用户, 则允许推送.

(在任意地方)右键打开Git Bash Here.

生成ssh密钥文件, 然后连续三次回车;

打开github的账户中的Settings, 打开SSH and GPG keys这个页面;

C:\Users\hwx_pc\.ssh在这个路径中找到文件id_rsa.pub(也可以用Everything找), 用记事本打开, 将内容复制并粘贴到key中;

添加完成如图；

回到github bash, 输入:

这样就是连接成功了.

新建仓库

在github新建一个仓库, 输入自己的账户名, 后面加上.github.io, 点击Initialize this repository with a README

配置文件

在hexo的根目录下找到_config.yml文件, 修改Deployment中的参数选项;

repo为github pages的访问ip地址;

部署/更新

想要部署或者内容, 在hexo根目录下输入以下命令

即可访问该网页;
Fomalhaut Wiki

问题排查

  • Connection refuesd
    在git bash中，输入ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "2557095375@qq.com"后可能会出现一种情况, 报错显示无法访问;
    确认浏览器可以正常登入github之后, 可能是因为22端口被电脑或路由器的防火墙屏蔽了, 则用443端口代替;

在这个文件添加如下内容, ssh连接github的时候就会使用443端口;

再进行测试即可.

如果还是不行, 可能github的DNS被污染了, 可以从下面文章找到解决方法.

参考资料: 坑：ssh: connect to host github.com port 22: Connection refused

  • Unsupported proxy syntax in ‘:7890’:No host part in the URL

输入hexo d之后可能会出现以下报错:

这个情况是本机系统代理端口和git端口不一致导致的, 也有可能是没有设置git对应端口;

查看自己本机的系统代理;
设置–网络和Internet–代理–手动设置代理

修改git配置, 其中7890为电脑的端口;

再次部署则成功.

  • Error: EPERM: operation not permitted, unlink ‘D:\OneDrive - 华南师范大学\fomalhaut_wiki.deploy_git\2024\09\14’

疑似OneDrive同步导致的问题, 重启OneDrive等待同步完成即可.

entry.title: IELTS Writing
entry.content:
IELTs Writing Task 1

Graph

Car ownership

The graph below gives information about car ownership in Britain from 1971 to 2007.

The graph shows changes in the number of cars per household in Great Britain over a period of 36 years.

Overall, car ownership in Britain increased between 1971 and 2007. In particular, the percentage of households with two cars rose, while the figure for households without a car fell.

In 1971, almost half of all British households did not have regular use of car. Around 44% of households had one car, but only about 7% had two cars. It was uncommon for families to own three or more cars, with around 2% of households falling into this category.

The one-car household was the most common type from the late 1970s onwards, although there was little change in the figures for the category. The biggest change was seen in the proportion of households without a car, which fell steadily over the 36-year period to around 25% in 2007. In contrast, the proportion of two-car families rose steadily, reaching about 26% in 2007, and the proportion of households with more than two cars rose by around 5%.

Internet users

The graph below shows changes in the proportion of Internet users in three different countries from 1999 to 2009

The line graph compares the percentage of people in three countries who used the Internet between 1999 and 2009.

It is clear that the proporton of the population who used the Internet in each country over the period shown. Canada experienced the fastest growth in Internet usage, whereas Mexico remained the country with lowest proportion of people who accessed the Internet.

In 1999, the proportion of people using the Internet in the USA stood at about 20%. By contrast, the figures for Canada and Mexico were significantly lower, at around 10% and 5% respectively. However, in the year 2002, Canada overtook the USA in terms of the proportion of its citizens who went online.

In 2005, Internet usage in both the USA and Canada rose to around 70% of the population, while the figure for Mexico reached just over 25%. Four years later, in 2009, the percentage of Internet users was considerably higher in Candada than in the other two countries. In that year, almost 100% of Canadians used the Internet, compared to about 80% of Americans and only 40% of Mexicans.

Migration

The chart below shows figures for long-term international migration to and from the UK over a 10-year period.

The chart gives information about UK immigration, emigration and net migration between 1999 and 2008.

Both immigration and emigration rates rose over the period shown, but the figures for immigration were significantly higher. Net migration peaked in 2004 and 2007.

In 1999, over 450,000 people came to live in the UK, while the number of people who emigrated stood at just under 300,000. The figure for net migration was around 160,000, and it reamined at a similar level until 2003. From 1999 to 2004, the immigration rate rose by nearly 150,000 people, but there was a much smaller rise in emigration. Net migration peaked at almost 250,000 people in 2004.

After 2004, the rate of immigration remained high, but the number of people emigrating fluctuated. Emigration fell suddenly in 2007, before peaking at about 420,000 people in 2008. As a result, the net migration figure rose to around 240,000 in 2007, but fell back to around 160,000 in 2008.

entry.title: IELTS阅读做题技巧
entry.content:
雅思阅读概述

流程：听力-阅读-写作
时间：60min三篇阅读，平均一篇阅读20min
模式：机考/纸笔

目标分数：7.5

错误率： 每篇文章错误在两个以内，三篇文章总共错题不超过六道；

找到定位词

勾画出题干中的定位词，使用组合定位：

  • 眼球词词汇+n. (眼球词词汇指的是能够快速锁定，较为特殊的词汇，例如时间地点数字人名以及长难生词)
  • adj.+n. (从抽象到具体，抽象名词不需要画出来，只需要记具体名词)
  • n.+n. (总会有原词出现，因此最好把所有出现的名词都画下来)

名词不好进行同义替换，因此可以用于定位；

考点词同义替换

1.词性替换

  • Egypt - Egyptian
  • fertilize - fertilizers

2.同义替换

  • tough - difficult
  • hard - tough
  • copy - follow - mimic - replicate - duplicate

3.肯否转换

  • not traditional - new
  • worth exploring - shouldn’t exclude its possibility

4.抽象具体转换（子集&具体化）

  • environment - light, sound and warmth
  • university - South China Normal University

5.解释说明（以名词为主）

  • lack - do not exist

6.主被动

This room is for Mary - This room is occupied by Mary

题型分解

小标题 List of Headings

对每个段落赋予方框中的一个小标题，对相应的内容进行概括；

可以利用其他题目来做，利用选择题的细节题来找对应；

做题的时候对每一个Headings进行拆解（即先阅读完所有的headings），然后再去扫读文章来确定答案

多注意动词和形容词的，题干中动词和形容词画出来，文章中动词和形容词画出来

每做完一个删除一个，一个词触发答案，所在句要检查；（检查对象，句意）

答案句通常出现在首局和尾句上

可以像老师一样去判断这个段落是否有离题

人名匹配

把人名与观点或事迹进行对应；

三个位置：

  • 全称，完整的名字
  • 指代 / last name / 身份
  • 两个人一起说观点，观点属于第一作者

studied/researched/experimented/suggested/chaimed/concluded/found/speculated/note+观点

做这种题顺序，先去扫读文章，如果一个段落中没有出现人名，则迅速跳过，如果出现人名，则看题目中有没有出现对应的人物，如果没有也是迅速跳过；

文章中，特定人物对应的内容一般再人物下方，也有可能往上走。

例如出现this，人名前有逻辑关系词(for example)，人名后方内容所剩无几

方向：

  • 往下
  • 往上（this, for example, ‘’, 内容所剩无几）

重点关注有引号的内容

半句匹配

题干+选项=文章中的一句话，两句话或者是半个段落的同替；

信息包含

Which paragraph contains the following information?

题干中的信息对应文章中的信息：原词/同替

特点：

  • 不需要概括大意，只需要包含信息
  • 可以有原词
  • 本质是词与词的同义替换

利用定位词的原理，以及考点词的同义替换，来找到对应的段落；同时借助其他题目来帮助定位；（人名，填空）

先通过题干中出现的抽象词，来判断出一个大致的筛选范围：

the importance of finding the real cause under the dispute

从题干回到文章之后，只需要扫读，找到对应的单词或者同义替换，不要去理解原文是什么意思。

对应出某一个词后，检查该词所在的句子其他对象是否复现，匹配

抽象词对应：

抽象词缩小范围，再由具体词锁定段落

可以通过将题干写几个中文的单词，然后再从文章对应

判断题

三个选项：

  • TRUE
  • FALSE
  • NOT GIVEN

多了一个选项：if there is no information on this （题干：西瓜，原文：芒果）

三个基础概念：

  • 定位词
  • 考点词
  • 陷阱

作为细节题，做法与填空题大致相同，通过题干中的定位词找到文章对应的答案句，再从两个句子中找到考点词的同义替换，或者理解句意来做题；

判断题的方法核心在于：理解句意

五种陷阱：

  1. 是非能够陷阱

Efficient cities can improve the quality of life for their inhabitants.

can improve这里作为陷阱，句子其余部分可以作为定位词和考点词去寻找文章对应的内容。

文章：pointed out that these more efficient cities were able to put the difference into attracting industry and jobs or creating a better place to live.

显然是T

  1. 程度陷阱

The ISTP study examined public and private systems in every city of the world.

most, only, all, -est, every, both, 数字 都可以作为程度陷阱

文章：The study compared the proportion of wealth poured into transport by thirty-seven cities around the world.

显然选择F

  1. 比较陷阱
  • 不变：谁在比
  • 变：比什么

Private schools in Japan are more modern and spacious than state-run lower secondary schools.

文章：Schools are usually modern in design, set well back from the road and spacious inside.

显然是不存在比较关系，因此选NG

  1. 原因目的陷阱

（逻辑推理，排除了所有的可能性，剩下的就是答案）

The FAA was created as a result of the introduction of the jet engine.

文章：An accident that occurred in the skies over the Grand Canyon in 1956 resulted in the establishment of the Federal Aviation Administration to regulate and oversee the operation of aircraft in the skies over the United States, which were becoming quite congested.

因此选择NG

  1. 动词后方陷阱

The essay, ‘In the company of ants’, explores ant communication.

文章：in his essay ‘In the company of ants’, advises readers who ask what to do with the ants in their kitchen to: “Watch where you step. Be carful of little lives.’

根据排他性原则，这题选择NG

Not Given中容易考到的点

  1. 权威效应

    I believe Chinese football team is much better that Brazilian one.

文章：Chinese football team is much better than Brazilian one.

选择NG，事实和人们认为的往往有出入；

  1. 主客观转换
    原文出现发誓，承诺，愿望，决心等主观限定词，而题目去掉其限定词变成客观事实陈述，则选Not Given
    常见有：Promise, Vow, Swear, Aim, Pledge, Resolve, Guarantee

  2. 偷换概念，范围大小变化

  • 打印机是1885年发明的
  • 激光打印机是1885年发明的

一般只要题干和内容讨论的东西不在一个具体的层次，就是NG，为了减少看漏，可以两题为一组去做

关键是看一个行为是否具有排他性

填空题 有选项/无选项

特征：

  • 顺序出题，个别乱序（往前找）
  • 局部范围，细节出题，一般是1~3个段落
  • 必有逻辑，有明现逻辑关系词，空的前后逻辑，看空的前后位置

方法：

填空题方法的核心在于：特征关系

现在一篇文章中锁定一个段落，然后再到一句话，最后一个词；

定位段落：
在题干中画出定位词之后，回到文章先找眼球词词汇，然后再到名词或者形容词+名词；最后是由名词来确定固定的段落；

如果没有眼球词词汇，可以利用邻近题来帮助定位；

此题的定位词为： complex, Step Pyramid, surroundings, Egyptian, past

此题的定位词为： 18th century, engineer, first iron bridge

定位句子
利用定位词中考点词的同义替换来找到对应的句子；

定位单词

  • 逻辑关系词 (but, however, more, in addition…)

在空的前后找到逻辑关系词的同义替换，定位到具体的单词；

  • 空前后关系
    1. 确定词数
    2. 确定词性
    3. 确定特征（通过题干的前后找到修饰这个单词的内容）

单选题

雅思阅读的所有题目，每个问题都有对应的答案句，雅思阅读的题目没有推理，只有对应的答案句，因此每个题目都要找到对应的答案句。

特征：

  • 顺序出题，题题之间顺序出题，选项也是顺序出题
  • 出题频率为60%
  • 单题不会跨段出题，找到A选项后，BCD都会在该段落以内，或者没有提到；

==务必找到答案句！==

不需要提前阅读选项，提前阅读容易被误导；

做法：勾画题干的定位词和考点词，然后定位到答案句进行选项比对；（和填空题差不多）

就算选项在文章有对应的地方，即选项是正确的，但是如何选项没有回答题干的问题，则视为错误；

如果题干需要概述一个段落，以句为单位找段落中有逻辑关系词的句子；(And不算)

像选项it would be wrong to overlook the contribution of sound to the artistry of films这种用了wrong或者mistaken的委婉语气，一般都是正确的；

多选题

  1. 阅读5个题干
  2. 勾画定位词

通过多选的选项和文章内容进行反复比较，一旦出现足够数目的正确答案就结束；

每次只阅读一个段落

优先选择柔和语气

完整套题做法

先做细节题，再做全文题

细节题的反应过程中，也可以得到全文题的答案

套题分类：

  • 2全文题，1细节题
  • 2细节题，1全文题
  • 全细节题

全文题：contain，people，heading

2细节题和全细节题，需要按题型来做，即先做细节题，如果发现该段落的细节题已经考察完了，下一个细节题更换段落了，则需要完成该段落的全文题。

当全文题比较多的时候，即2全文题，1细节题时，应该按照段落去做，完成一个段落的所有题目，再去完成下一个段落。

先处理好，全文题的选项，定出细节题第一题的位置，不做题，如果一个段落有细节也有全文，先做细节题，可以通过细节题推导全文题

一般只会出现contain+people或者heading+people

判断完细节题开始的段落之后，前面没有细节题的段落可以扫读看有没有人名和contain的代号信息；

entry.title: IELTS Speaking
entry.content:
Oral expression accumulation

Your vision was right.

A vision refers to a mental image or a dream, commonly used in the real world to refer to a person’s ability to think about the future with imagination or intelligence.

Tai Lung has broken out of prison.
Do you feel stuck? Try to break out of your daily routine.
You broke out of your normal roles to accomplish something as a family.

It means to escapte from a place, aslo can be used figuratively, meaning to escape a situation.

He wasn’t even meant to be here.

Contrastive stress. It means something wasn’t planned or supposed to happen.

All good things come to an end.

When going through changes or losses in life, one can refer to this saying. It works as a reminder to appreciate the good moments because they will not always be there.

I don’t like to use this phrase because it’s offensive to our kind.

One’s kind refers to people with whom we have things in common or who share a similar background to ours.

And if I go back, Max, it’s the end of the line for me.

Something is the end of the line, it means that it has ended or that it won’t be possible to continue it and it’s better to give it up.

Friends, I am afraid that I have some terrible news.
I’m afraid I can’t help you. It’s gone, you know.
Well, I’m afraid Fiona isn’t really warming up to Prince Charming.

It can be used when I have to introduce some sad or bad news. Also can be used as a synonym for I’m sorry.

He’s not going to eat us, we’ve already been over it.
But first, let’s go over the rules.

Going over something is the same as reviewing, examining, or checking something carefully.

We gotta save him. = We have got to save him.
You gotta be kidding me. = You got to be kidding me.

“we have got to” becomes “we gotta”

Same way I found out your name.
And I intent to find out which.

To find out means to discover or to become aware and learn about sth.

So your mistake will be short-lived.
His experience as a professional lawyer was short-lived.

If sth is short-lived, it only lasts for a short period of time.

I’m all ears.

I’m all ears = I’m listening carefully.

Speaking practice by gpt-4

Chatgpt prompts: I want you to act as an IELTS speaking examiner. I will show you the question. Then I give a ambiguous answer which refers to my real situation. You should correct it and tell me how to express to the IELTS examiner more colloquially not complicatedly.

entry.title: Isaac Sim (Container)学习
entry.content:
与下载到本地Linux的Isaac Sim不同, 由于采用服务器的方式, 整个Isaac Sim都需要在Docker中运行, 所有的应用都要采取Headless mode.

Isaac Sim 安装

Container Installation

Isaac Sim 启动

创建docker容器

加载GUI

同时启用多个doker容器的终端

之后的docker启动只能从服务器主机进行, 不能直接ssh进到container中启动Isaac Sim

Vscode连接source code

由于服务器是通过vscode中的remote ssh连接, 然后isaac-sim在docker中运行.

在docker中配置ssh, 然后用vscode的remote-ssh连接

然后重启和检查ssh服务

设置登录密码

在windows终端, 如果之前生成过ssh key, 需要删除

基本操作逻辑

  • Alt+左键旋转视角
  • 鼠标滚轮放大缩小
  • 鼠标滚轮按着平移
  • 右边操作树选中物体后，按F聚焦物体

Extension

Usage: Building interactive GUIs, custom application modules, and real-time sensitive applications.

Standalone Application

Usage: Large scale traning for reinforcement learning, systematic world generation, and modification.

对于container中的Isaac Sim:

The Isaac Sim container supports running our Python apps and standalone examples in headless mode only.

要执行standalone application, 首先需要确定standalone python script和python.sh (通常在根目录下) 的路径.

例如要运行follow_target_with_rmpflow.py, 该路径为standalone_examples/api/omni.isaac.franka/follow_target_with_rmpflow.py;

配置Python Environment

进入isaac-sim的根目录

打开根目录下的apps/omni.isaac.sim.python.kit文件, 添加以下内容

对于Python的脚本, 需要进行一个修改:

启动~

franka机械臂仿真程序

以follow_target_with_rmpflow.py和franka_gripper.py为例机型讲解

follow_target_with_rmpflow.py

其中用到的库文件:
/isaac-sim/exts/omni.isaac.franka/omni/isaac/franka/controllers/rmpflow_controller.py

/isaac-sim/exts/omni.isaac.franka/omni/isaac/franka/tasks/follow_target.py

franka_gripper.py

Isaac Lab

Isaac Lab is the official robot learning framework for Isaac Sim, providing APIs and examples for reinforcement learning, imitation learning, and more.

Isaac Gym is a deprecated framework. All reinforcement learning and imitation learning examples have been migrated to Isaac Lab.

Troubleshooting

  • 一直警告: 2024-09-18 09:42:53 [17,934ms] [Warning] [omni.graph.core.plugin] OmniGraphSettings::getCudaDeviceOrdinal: unable to get a valid CUDA device id from the renderer. Defaulting to GPU0.

之前启用的python脚本占用了CUDA的ID, 但是没有释放, 重新启动docker即可.

参考资料

NVIDIA Omniverse和Isaac Sim笔记9：Standalone工作流介绍与IMU帧率设置

entry.title: Iterative Optimal Control for Robotics System
Lean English With Movies and TV Series
entry.content:
Translations mostly refers to gpt-4.

GPT prompts: I am watching movies now, can you explain the specific words or phrase which I don’t understand? You should also give other examples.

Minions

Making their master happy was the tribe’s very reason for existence.

a group of people of the same race, and with the same customs, language, religion, etc, living in a particular area and often led by a chief.

With the emergence of the Stone Age came the rise of a new species.

start to exist, to appear or become known

But keeping a boss, therein lies the rub.

Suggests that the real challenge or problem is in keeping a boss, therein lies the rub = that is where the problem is = there’s the rub.

The Minions took an instant liking to man.

happening immediately

Ancient Egypt held great promise.

Sth or sb showed a lot of potential or indicated (point out, show, be a sign of something) a high likelihood (the chance of sth happening; how likely sth is to happen) or future success

One particular employer took their failure very very badly.

Someone reacted strongly and negatively to their own failure or mistake, it implies a deep sense of disappointment, regret, or emotional pain in response to not succeeding or meeting one’s own expectations

And then, when all hope seemed lost, they found sanctuary.

A place of refuge (a condition or place of safety, where one is protected from danger, distress (it conveys a sense of extreme sorrow, suffering, or discomfort), or trouble.) or safety, a sanctuary can be a place where people or animals are protected and cannot be harmed or captured.

Years passed as the Minions forged their own civilization.

Implies a sense of active creation or shaping, often through hard work and determination, Minions built, developed, or established their own unique society or culture over time.

If this continued any longer, the Minions would perish.

Perish is a formal or literary word that means to die, especially in a sudden or terrible way, suggests a serious, dire (describes a situation or event that is extrmely serious or urgent, often involving great risk or suffering.) consequence, emphasizing the severity of the situation. The statement conveys a sense of urgency or danger, implying that the continuation of a certain event or circumstance would lead to the demise (refers to a person’s death or the end of sth’s existence or operation.) or extinction of the Minions.

Truth be told, Stuart had no idea what he was chosen for, but was thrilled it made people cheer for him.

Stuart was extremely excited, pleased or happy. It conveys a strong feeling of elation (a feeling of great joy) or joy.

Attend guest lectures from esteemed villains, make contacts in the underworld community.

Esteemed means highly respected or admired.

These adorable little freaks are headed to Orlando, too!

Tranditionally, freak can refer to sth very unusual or unexpected, sometimes carry a negative or derogatory(showing a critical or disrespectful attitude) connotation(additional meaning carries beyond its literal definition).

Dad! We got company! It’s because I tripped the alarm.

Got company is an informal way to say that someone is approaching or has arrived, typically in an unexpected or unwelcome manner.

What a small world! Hope we’re not in rival gangs.

Potential conflicts or differences between the two people meeting.

Oh, Kevin, you don’t wanna work for him! He ate his last henchmen!

Henchmen refers to loyal and subservient followers or helpers, expecially those who engage in criminal activities for a powerful leader or boss.

Ten times the evil in half the package.

This phrase describe sb/sth is extremely malevolent(having or showing a desire to harm other people) or harmful while being deceptively(likely to make you believe sth that is not true) small or unassuming in appearance.

You see this tiny little trinket?

Trinket refers to a small ornament(an object that is used as decoration in a room, garden/yard, etc. rather than for a particular purpose) or item of jewelry that is of little value.

Love the constume!

The clothes worn by actors in a play or movie, or worn by sb to make them look like sth else; The clothes worn by people from a particular place or during a particular historical period.

Buckle up, boys!

Literally, it’s directive to fasten their seatbelts for safety. Figuratively, it’s playful way to say “Get ready for an adventure!”.

But right now, it’s leaking radiation like you would not believe!

It means that radiation is being emitted or released from a particular source.
Like you would not believe is an idiomatic expression used to emphasize the extent or degree of sth.

Herb, these are the new recruits.

It refers to individuals who have recently joined a group, organization, team, or cause.

Right on! You guys are crazy little and way yellow, and I dig that!

Right on is an expression of strong support, approval, or encouragement.
Dig is another common slang term for like. For instance, I dug that movie.

Oh, I love England. The music, the fashion. I’m seriously thinking about overthrowing it someday.

Overthrowing refers to forcibly removing or displacing a system, government, ruler, or authority from power.

You can use it to hypnotize anyone. Anyone!

Hypnotize refers to the ability to put someone into a trance-like(a state in which sb seems to be asleep but is aware of what is said to them) state, making them susceptible(very likely to be influenced, harmed or affected by sb/sth) to suggestions or controlling their action, typically using a specific tool or method.

I feel like a proud mama with three dashing evil sons.

Attractive, confident, fashionable and elegant.

All the three little piggies had to do was just steal on little crown that the beautiful wolf had wanted ever since she was a penniless little street cub, unloved and abandoned.

Being penniless means she was without money, suggesting poverty or hardship. The term “street cub“ implies she was young and alone, roaming the streets, likely fending for herself.

So the wolf huffed and puffed, and she blew them off the face of the earth!

The wolf’s actions are described in a much more intense manner, suggesting that she completely obliterated(eliminate) or got rid of the pigs in a significant way.

You’re not allowed in without an adult. Scram, hooligans!

Scram is a colloquial(used in conversation but not in formal speech or writing) term that means “go away” or “leave immediately”.
Hooligans refers to people, typically young, who are noisy, rowdy(making a lot of noise or likely to cause trouble), or disruptive.

This is a restricted area!

Restricted means access to this particular location or space is limited or controlled.

You think it’s funny to mock the elderly, do you?

To mock sb means to ridicule(unkind comments that make fun of sb/sth or make them look silly), mimic(to copy the way sb speaks, moves, behaves, etc., especially in order to make other people laugh), or make fun of them, often in a mean-spirited or belittling(to make sb or the things that sb does seem unimportant) manner.

The Queen’s crown has been kidnapped, Sarge!

Be taken against their will.

Bob, who appears to be a bald, jaundiced child, has pulled the famed sword right from its stone which legend dictates, makes him the new king.

Bald means people without hair on the head.
Jaundiced means Minions has yellow skin here.(Mostly a diease)
Legend dictates refers to what a well-known story or myth prescribes or sets as a standard.

Tiny yellow traitor!

A persion who betrays sb or sth, such as a friend, cause, or principle.

I’d wear a dress so sparkly, it glowed!

It glowed conveys a wish or a fantasy about wearing a dress that is exceptionally shiny or radiant.

And you pinheads screwed it up!

Screw it up is a slang expression meaning to make a mistake or mishandle a situation, resulting in negative consequences.

No, no, no, King Bob! You cannot just abdicate the throne!

Abdicate the throne means to relinquish(to stop having sth, especially when this happens unwillingly) or give up one’s position as a monarch or ruler.

If I wasn’t so polite, I’d say this spells certain doom for the country.

Doom refers to an impending(going to happen very soon) negative or disastrous outcome.

I’m a dungeon master. Prepare for torture which I do.

Dungeon is a dark underground room used as a prison, especially in a castle.
Torture means the act of causing sb severe pain in order to punish them or make them say or do sth.

Oh, I’ve got a groovy idea!

Fashionable, attractive and interesting.

Mrs. Overkill, the hair in that picture, it’s just two wavy lines!

Having curves, not straight.

Oh, so, what, now you’re an art critic?

A person who expresses opinions about the good and bad qualities of books, music, etc.

The high collar and cinched waist reflect a simpler, more violent time.

High collar is a fashion detail, prevalent in different periods of history, often stands for formality, modesty, or status.
Cinched waist refers to a waist that has been made smaller or more slender by compression, often using corset or belts. Throughout history, a cinched or tighty-laced waist was beauty standard in various cultures, sybolizing femininity.

The material is a blend of taffeta and high-density body armor.

This is a crisp, smooth, plain woven fabric made from silk or synthetic fibers. It’s known for its shiny surface and is often used in evening dresses.

Must have tiny waist.

To have a slender or narrow waist.

Thanks for doing this, padre.
Come here, let me squeeze you! Oh, you are so squishy!

A person who is qualified to perform religious duties and ceremonies.
Squishy means soft and wet.

Villains, this is no longer a coronation! It is an execution!

Coronation refers to a ceremony where a monarch is formally crowned and inaugurated(the act of formally introducing or initiating sth, particularly with a ceremony ).
Execution refers to the act of killing sb, especially as a legal punishment.

And just for the record, my little deviled eggs, you can thank Kevin for what I’m about to do to you!

Deviled eggs traditionally refers to a dish made from hard-boiled eggs.

You imbecile! Have fun exploding!

It’s an offensive word used to insult someone’s intelligence or decision-making, implying they are stupid or foolish.

The countty owes you a great debt of gratitude.

Gratitude means a feeling of thankfulness or appreciation. Essentially, the statement is a formal way of saying “Thank you for what you’ve done for the country.”

Bob, you were a wise and noble king for all of eight hours.

Noble describes sb with high moral principles, good character, and honor.

Oh，spectacular!

Very impressive.

For you, I have this beautiful, super-duper, incredible snow globe!

This is an informal term used to emphasize the greatness or impressiveness of sth. It’s a way of saying “really great” or “exceptional”.

For your bravery and valor, I am knighting you.

Valor refers to great courage in the face of danger, especially in battle.

Things look bleak, baby, I’m not gonna lie!

Bleak describes a situation that is not hopeful or encouraging, one that is gloomy(without much hope of success or happiness in the future), desolate(very lonely and unhappy), or dreary(makes you feel sad; dull and not interesting).

Are you really going to allow that little penguin to make off with my crown?

Make off means to leave quickly, especially to escape or to steal sth.

He was cunning, he was evil, he was perfect.

Cunning describes sb who is skilled in achieving their goals by deceit(dishonest behaviour that is intended to make sb believe sth that is not true) or evasion(the act of avoiding sb of avoiding sth that you are supposed to do). It suggests cleverness, especially in a sly(acting or done in a secret or dishonest way, often intending to trick people) or manipulative(Skilful at influencing sb or forcing sb to do what you want, often in an unfair way) way.

Angry Bird

I have no choice but to impose the maximum penalty allowed by the law.

Penalty refers to a punishment or consequence imposed for wrongdoing, violation, or offense. This punishment is typically given as a result of breaking rules or laws.

And I’m just super psyched to be taking this journey with you! You’re gonna have a blast.

Psyched is slang that means being very excited, enthusiastic, or eager about something.
Blast is slang for a great and enjoyable time or experience.

You have shared with us the wonders of your quaint, simple little island.

Quaint is adjective that describes sth as having an old-fashioned charm or being attractively unusual or peculiar(strange or unusual, especially in a way that is unpleasant or worrying) in design or appearance.

Say hello to the slingshot!

Slingshot refers a small handheld weapon that consists of a Y-shaped frame with an elastic band attached to the two top prongs.

The trampoline!

A piece of equipment that is used in gymnastics for doing jumps in the air.

I am famished… -it’s chow time!

Famished is an adjective that means extremely hungry.

And now we’ve come to the prestigious Palms district.

Prestigious is used to describe something that is admired or respected, often due to its high status, reputation, or importance.

My friend from the banquet.

A formal meal for a large number of people, usually for a special occasion.

Water is the softest thing, yet it can penetrate mountains and earth.

Penetrate means to pass into or through, often by overcoming resistance.

What the caterpillar calls the end, the world calls a butterfly.

It suggests that what may seem like an ending or a loss can actually be the start of something beautiful and new when viewed from a different perspective.

That’s very lifelike.

Lifelike describes sth that closely resembles or imitates real life.

How do we know you’re not fugitives of the law?

Fugitives refers to persons who are fleeing or escaping from custody (being held by police or other authorities, especially while awaiting trial), typically to avoid arrest or imprisonment. A fugitive can be someone who has committed a crime, is suspected of a crime, or has benn convicted and is avoiding serving their sentence.

You might want to shield your eyes from the sparkle of those trophies.

Trophies refers to prizes or awards given for a particular achievement.

Looking through binoculars, spying on old ladies.

Binoculars refers to an optical instrument with a lens for each eye, used for magnifying and viewing distant objects.

Thanks for your hospitality.

Hospitality refers to the friendly and generous reception and entertainment of guests, visitors, or strangers.

But how do we get from here to there? I am not aquatic in the least.

When referring to animals or plants, “aquatic” means living or growing in water. In this context, when a person uses the term “aquatic,” they are metaphorically suggesting a natural ability or comfort in water, typically in activities like swimming.

Comeon, we’re birds. We’re descended from dinosaurs.

Descended means to have originated from or be related to a particluar ancestor or past form.

And I don’t need any clam, detached, happy birds.

Detached describes someone who is not emotionally involved or connected. A detached individual can seem indifferent, aloof, or distant.

I told you not to mess with me!

To comfront or challenge sb, oftern aggressively.(to tease or play a joke on sb in latter plot)

The treacherous birds have repaid our friendship with an unprovoked act of aggression.

Treacherous is used to describe someone or sth that is guilty of betrayal or deception(the act of deceiving or misleading someone). It implies untrustworthiness or unreliability.
Unprovoked describes an action that is done without any apparent reason or justification. It indicates that the act of aggression was initiated without any prior provocation (the act of doing or saying sth deliberately in order to make sb angry or upset) or reason from the other party.

You’re wrecking my house…You wrecked my houes…Well, now we’re even.

Wreck means to destroy or cause significant damage to sth.
We’re even is an idiomatic expression that means both parties are now equal in terms of debts or obligations (a duty or responsibility to undertake an action or a commitment), often after one person has retaliated or made up for a wrong done to them.

I’m not blushing. I’m just red.

Blushing refers to the involuntary reddening (the automatic or unintentional change in skin color to a reddish hue) of the face, usually triggered by emotions such as embarrassment, shame, or shyness.

You know, back when I was angry, that would have really ticked me off.

Ticked me off is an idiomatic expression that means made me angry or annoyed me.

How did you guys find the time to pull this off? This is why we went to go get pedicures, isn’t it?
Nope. We got pedicures because we’re worth it.

Pull this off is an idiomatic expression that means to successfully achieve or complete something, especially when faced with difficulties or challenges.
A pedicure is a cosmetic (pertains to enhancing or improving appearance) treatment for the feet and toenails.

Well, this just got awkward.
That’ really insensitive.

Insensitive is used to describe sb or sth showing a lack of consideration for another’s feelings, needs, or particular situations. It indicates a lack of empathy or awareness.

Want to go get a bite?
Forget it. Let’s just go home.

Get a bite is an informal way of saying have something to eat or go out to eat.

Roommates! I can’t wait to make a chores list.

The term chores list refers to a list of household tasks or duties that need to be completed.

He’s hatching a new plan.

Originally, hatching refers to the process by which an animal breaks out of an egg. In this context, it means that he is devising, forming, or coming up with a new plan or idea metaphorically.

A Million Miles Away

A hostile rocket… mid-flight?

Hostile describe sth that is unfriendly or adversarial (involving people who are in opposition and who make attacks on each other) in nature.

Having a clear mind during an emergency is imperative.

It means vital importance or crucial, the statement emphasizes that it’s essential to maintain a clear and focused mindset during emergency situations.

I’m busting my ass. My body hurts. I can’t sleep.

The phrase is an informal and coarse (rude and offensive) expression that means working very hard or putting in a lot of effort, often to the physical or mental exhaustion.

It’s as though the whole place is sacred.

Sacred describes sth that is regarded with great respect and reverence (a feeling of great respect or admiration for sb/sth), expecially in a spiritual or religuous context.

I, too, had to work so hard. Tenacity is a superpower.

Tenacity refers to the quality of being very determined, persistent, or unyielding, even in the face of challenges or adversity (a difficult or unpleasant situation).

The safety divers, they’re only there as a precaution.

Precaution refers to a measure taken in advance to prevent something dangerous or undesirable from happening.

Any assistance from the divers will disqualify you.

Disqualify means to declare someone ineligible (not having the necessary qualifications to have or to do sth) or unfit to participate in a particular activity or to be considered for a particular honor due to a specific reason or action.

Flight director LeRoy Cain is now instructing controllers to get out their contingency procedures.

Contingency refers to a future event or circumstance that is possible but cannot be predicted with certainty or one that could cause problems.

A piece of foam insulation broke off the external tank and struck the left wing of the orbiter.

Foam insulation refers to a material used to insulate and protect various structures, particularly in aerospace contexts.

Folks down at the Selection Office, would like to have a word.

Folks down is an informal way to refer to the people or group of individuals at a particular location.

Zootopia

Fear. Treachery. Bloodlust. Thousands of years ago… these were the forces that ruled our world. A world where prey were scared of predators.

Treachery refers to betrayal or deceptive action. It evokes a sense of mistrust and the idea that alliances could be easily broken, leading to chaos and conflict.
Bloodlust describes an intense an violent desire to kill or injure. It paints a picture of a world dominated by aggression and the desire for conquest.
Prey These are animals that are hunted and killed by other animals for food.
Predator These are animals that hunt, kill, and eat other animals. They are often at the top of the food chain and are seen as a threat to those lower down.

And predators had an uncontrollable biological urge to maim and maul…

Maim To injure severely, especially in such a way that part of the body is permanently damaged or disfigured.
Maul To handle or treat roughly, often causing injury. In the context of animals, it means to attack or injure by biting, striking, or tearing at.

Back them, the world was divided in two. Vicious predator or meek prey.

Vicious denotes sb/sth that is aggressive, cruel. or violent.
Meek describes sb/sth that is gentle, submissive, or lacking in force or assertiveness.

And every young mammal has multitudinous opportunities.

Multitudinous means very numerous or existing in great numbers.

I don’t have to cower in a herd anymore.

To cower means to shrink away or crouch down, typically out of fear or submission.
A herd refers to a large group of animals, especially hoofed mammals, that live together or are kept together as livestock.

I don’t have to be a lonely hunter anymore. Today, I can hunt for tax exemptions. I’m gonna be an actuary.

A tax exemption is a monetary exclusion that reduces the taxable income.
An actuary is a business professional who deals the financial impact of risk and uncertainty.

Carrot farming is a noble profession.

Noble means having or showing fine personal qualities or high moral principles.

Hey! You heard her. Cut it out.

When sb says cut it out, they are telling someone else to stop what they are doing, especially if it is annoying, troublesome, or inappropriate.

Nice costume, loser.

Costume refers to a set of clothes worn by an actor for a particular role or by sb attending a masquerade or a special event.

Listen up, cadets.

Cadets are individuals who are in training to become members of military organization or who are undergoing some form of structured training program, often in preparation for a future role in the military or a related field.

Filthy toilet! You’re dead, Fluff Butt.

Filthy is used to describe a toilet that is very dirty, unsanitary, or unclean.
Fluff refers soft animal fur or bird feathers, that is found especially on young animals or birds.

As mayor of Zootopia, I am proud to announce that my Mammal Inclusion Initiative has produced its first police academy graduate.

It suggests a program or policy that has been put in place to promote the inclusion of all mammals, regardless of their species, size, or other characteristics, in the society of Zootopia. The goal of this initiative is likely to ensure that mammals of all types are represented and have equal opportunities, particularly in professions like law enforcement, which is indicated by the mention of the police academy.

Valedictorian of her class, ZPD’s very first rabbit officer, Judy Hopps!

The student who has the highest marks/grades in a particular group of students and who gives the valedictory speech at a graduation ceremony.

You play cribbage with a weasel.

Cribbage is a card game that involves playing and grouping cards in combinations to gain poing.
A weasel is a small mammal known for its slender body and keen hunting skills.

The deterrent and the repellent, that’s all she needs.

A deterrent is sth that discourages or is intended to discourage sb from doing sth. It’s often used in the context of preventing undesirable actions or behaviors by making them seem unappealing or risky.
A repellent is a substance that drives away certain things, often insects or animals.

Terrific! Everyone wins!

Terrific used to describe sth as extremely good. It’s an expression of enthusiasm and approval.

entry.title: LLM + Robotics
entry.content:
基础知识

The way we program robots today is rigid! They can’t be flexibly re-programmed by everyday users.

传统机器人执行pick and place任务的流程:

  1. 利用cv算法检测出要抓取的目标物体;
  2. 计算机械臂该用什么姿势抓取物体;
  3. 移动机械臂到抓取姿势并抓取
  4. 根据要求移动机械臂到指定位置;
  5. 计算机械臂放下物体的姿势并放下;

传统机器人控制中存在的弊端:

  • 对于每一个任务, 现实中有大量边缘情况, 需要设计更复杂的规则来应对;
  • 对于每一个任务都需要人类专家设计规则, 但现实中复杂任务数不胜数, 且任务之间很难融洽;

Two Fundamental Challenges:

  • Ground natural language in robot state.

如何把自然语言转换成能够被机器人识别, 处理的状态?

例如抓取桌子最左边的红色方块, 需要机器人识别和定位到桌子, 桌子上的物体, 红色的方块, 以及相对位置关系.

  • Planning actions to solve a task.

如何规划合适的动作来完成任务?

例如”把货架的苹果放到桌子上”, 整个执行流程随着任务的复杂程度不断增加;

同样的, 多个物体的task planning.

Microsoft提出了Robotics with ChatGPT的设计原则:

  1. 设计一个task-relevant的API Library, 这个库将high-level的自然语言指令转换为low-level的机器人动作.
  2. 给chatgpt设计prompt, 用来描述任务目标并且需要陈输出high-level的库, 这些prompt也会包含任务的约束;
  3. 用户通过实验结果不断优化prompt来优化chatgpt的输出;
  4. 如果用户对目前的chatgpt的输出感到满意, 则最后部署到实际的机器人上.

Learning 中出现的Scaling Law以及边界效应

Scaling Law

在机器学习中, 模型的性能通常遵循Power Law, 即性能提升与资源投入呈对数线性关系, 当数据和算力达到极大规模, 性能提升会逐渐放缓, 出现边际效应递减的现象;

科研机器人设计思路

目标是设计出一个机器人, 能够泛化的执行一些科研任务, 例如做材料实验, 化学实验等;

LLM在观测后输出一整个计划的行动序列, 就需要LLM对环境的未来走向有很好的了解.

Tricks for Improving Plan

  • 执行前Self-refine

在LLM生成plan后, 使用另一个LLM (或者人类设定的启发式评估函数) 来评估其好坏, 并且给出指导性意见;

但在这种情况下, LLM常常无法正确定位出错误; 通常会出现自己误导自己的情况;

  • Self-consistency

LLM通过多次生成规划并且选择最优的生成结果.

  • 执行后Self-reflection

让LLM从环境的反馈+自身反思中优化计划;

环境的反馈可能包括以下失败的原因:

  • 生成的动作不合规范, 没有正确调用action function;
  • 没有满足动作的执行条件, 如手中没有物体时, 执行放下物体的动作;
  • LLM自己以为生成的plan已经完成了任务, 实际任务还没有完成;
  • 生成的plan有很多冗余动作, 导致动作序列太长;

Replan机制: 结合ReAct与Planning

生成plan之后, 先执行plan获得环境的反馈和新观测信息后, 从当前状态继续规划;
同时, Replan允许LLM分析解决问题, 如可以先执行探索plan, 再根据结果调整和生成后续plan.

Tree search

如果计划未通过self-evaluation或执行失败, 在计划中的各步思考有哪些可行解决方案;

使用DFS或BFS, 在叶节点进行self-evaluation, 最终选择一条最优计划;

Tree search的缺点是

  • 消耗的tokens数大大增加;
  • 容易在错误的分支上花费很多搜索;

State tracking

预测出操作一步之后, 环境会发生什么样的变化, 对下一步的状态进行估计;

原本LLM应该包含这一步, 但是由于大模型的幻觉, 可能对下一步的状态估计不准确;

可以使用另一个LLM作为world model来预测每一步动作后的观测;

问题分析

  • 不着急直接输出Plan, 先让LLM自己分析一下这个问题: 这个问题有什么特点, 有什么易错点, 可以借助什么知识;
  • Step back: 退一步看问题, 先针对问题中的核心概念提一个相关问题, 再回答原问题;
  • 让LLM重新强调一下输入环境和规则的重点, 有助于提取关键信息和进一步思考;

Plan with Code

当再LLM的API输入high-level action之后得到的low-level actions sequence, 还可以让LLM直接生成代码, 例如生成Python代码;

其优点有:

  • 利用代码的逻辑能力和可直接执行性;
  • 有更高的自由性, 不只是调用已有的high-level action;
  • 有更好的复用性, 可以利用他人的代码以及保存已有代码;

甚至可以让LLM在code中自行定义有用的function;

Replan机制

如果计划遇到问题, 可以重新来过然后优化计划, 但是现实中常常不能重新来, 要在犯错后继续规划来完成任务.

需要做的事情:

  • 环境返回执行错误的原因,以及当前最新状态和观测
  • 让LLM解释犯错的原因

可以使用LLM worker, 监视每一步的执行结果, 或者在Plan code里面设定一些checkpoint, 保证环境变量按照计划执行;

Baseline 分析

LABOR Agent: Large Language Models for Orchestrating Bimanual Robots

OpenVLA: An Open-Source Vision-Language-Action Model

参考资料

  • Awesome-LLM-Robotics
  • Robotics+LLM系列通过大语言模型控制机器人
  • ChatGPT for Robotics: Design Principles and Model Abilities
  • LLM for Robotics前沿- 系统性讲解大语言模型如何助力通用机器人

entry.title: ManimCE
entry.content:
ManimCE 库（manim community edition）的前身是 manim 库，用于做数学可视化图像与动画，由 Grand Sanderson 创建，也就是 3Blue1Brown
的作者。它是一个开源的 python 库。

配置环境

Manim Community Edition

新建工程文件夹

在vscode中新建一个文件夹，然后新建一个.py为后缀的文件，即可开始code。

生成动画

例如：gallery.py

生成动画

四种画质：low, medium, high, 4k，分别对应-ql -qm -qh -qk

绘制函数图像

entry.title: Latex入门
entry.content:
为什么用latex

提高技术文档的工作效率，无论是官方的文档还是挑战杯、大创等等都需要大量的技术材料，这种专业的技术材料的写作通常都会使用latex进行排版，在战队编写文档的过程中，使用word容易出现格式不统一，整理和排版混乱的情况，在22赛季末的赛季总结排版工作中尤为严重，需要花费大量大量的时间和精力去做，因此使用latex进行替代，可以提前对文档进行排版，最终整合大家内容只需要进行一些简单的搬运工作即可完成最终的整合，同时能够形成风格统一，格式严整的文档，另外还可以使用git进行版本管理。

在做presentation中，通常还需要用到PPT，这里提供一个latex_beamer的解决方案，能够在短时间内，做出一份学术性强，比较academic的幻灯片，适合用于组会汇报，技术学术分享演讲等等。

Latex写作环境配置

  1. 给vscode安装插件（安装vscode记得选择添加到path）：
  1. 安装Texlive

Texlive官网

选择install on Windows->install-tl-windows.exe

下载好之后右键以管理员身份运行开始安装：（自行选择安装位置）

由于默认的编辑器并不好用，可以把安装TeXworks前端去掉；

  1. 配置vscode

安装好texlive重启vscode，Ctrl+,打开设置，右上角打开setting.json

添加以下内容，用花括号包起来：

  1. 安装SumatraPdf

SumatraPdf是vscode+latex的好帮手，同时也是一个好用的pdf阅读器；

官网

在setting.json中添加内容: (注意修改路径!)

  1. 设置SumatraPdf

选择设置，选择高级选项，然后打开一个.txt文件

在最后一行加入以下内容：（注意修改vscode的安装路径, 可以在应用的属性中找到, 这里的斜杠不用改, 且需要更改两处）

这样，就基本完成所有的配置了；

正向搜索：右键vscode界面，选择SyncTex form cursor，即可跳转到源代码对应pdf的内容。

  1. 测试

新建一个工程文件夹, 用vscode打开, 新建一个.tex文件;

输入:

编写完内容后点击绿色的编译按钮，左下角显示编译成功后，在点击打开pdf，即可查看pdf和导出。

Latex基础语法

开头

当我们需要一个中英文混排的文档的时候，需要对文档类型进行定义，一般使用命令\documentclass[UTF8]{ctexart}，UTF8是默认使用的编码类型，需要在命令中定义，否则可能会出现乱码。

所有位于\begin{document}之前的内容都被称作是导言区（preamble），写作开始前要在前言中做以下事情：

  • 设置文档的格式；
  • 设定页面的尺寸；
  • 在指定的文档中导入需要的宏包；
    介于\begin{document}和\end{document}之间的内容称为文档的正文区。

💡在修改导言区的设置中，一般需要编译两次才能成功修改文档的结果，而在正文区写作只需要编译一次即可。

封面

在导言区加入三行命令，分别是题目、作者和日期，同时在正文区加一行\maketitle，便可以实现一个简单的封面。

目录

生成目录的命令需要编译两次！

格式化命令

在正文区的写作中，在格式化命令的情况下，只需要将文字放入花括号即可。

标题

添加图片

需要在导言区中添加\usepackage{graphicx}宏包。

然后在正文中添加\includegraphics{}，花括号中的内容是图片的文件名，图片文件需要放入tex的文件夹中，一般不需要写文件后缀名，或者也可以利用vscode直接选择对应的文件。

通常图片的尺寸会很不合适，因此需要将图片的尺寸与文本进行匹配。这里的\textwidth表示文本的宽度，这里的图片等于文本的0.5倍宽度。

正常情况下还需要将图片居中，给图片出一个标题，因此需要图片嵌套在一个figure的环境中，利用\caption指定图片的标题。利用\centering命令将图片居中。

有时候图片会产生错位, 需要进行以下修改:

列表的创建

数学公式

  • 行内公式通过$...$进行填写；
  • 行外公式利用\begin{equation}...\end{equation}环境进行填写。

补充：数学公式在tex中成一个体系语言，需要用到时上网查阅即可。另外也可以通过各种公式编辑器进行数学公式的输入。

在线LaTeX公式编辑器-编辑器

表格的用法

Latex的表格绘制比较麻烦，可以用表格生成器代替：

Table Generator

将代码直接复制到tex文件即可.

Latex中文手册

Latex制作幻灯片

用latex做幻灯片的优点:

  • 学术性非常强;
  • 兼容latex的各种命令, 方便移植;
  • 编辑需要较强的逻辑性;
  • 输出为pdf, 方便跨设备分享;

利用beamer文档类型作为幻灯片格式，然后进行创作。

幻灯片的每一页都是一帧 frame, beamer的帧分为三类

通过\usetheme{}命令可以选择主题;`

Beamer Themes — Full List

示例报告

查看宏包说明

在安装TexLive的情况下，在vscode中，利用快捷键Ctrl+Shift+新建一个终端，输入texdoc <package>即可查看该宏包的官方说明文档；举例：输入texdoc background即可查看 background 宏包.

在电脑安装Everything的情况下（快速检索文件的一个软件），搜索<package>.sty即可得到该宏包的源码文件，通常无法更改，将该文件的属性中的权限改为可编辑即可修改。

例如background宏包通常有一个bug，搜索background.sty并更改编辑权限即可修改宏包的设置。

Latex模板

课程论文模板

  • https://ljguo1020.github.io/2022/02/25/LaTeX-vscode/

entry.title: PCB设计与电路基础
entry.content:
基础知识

PCB的结构如下：

上下两层为同层，中间叫做FR-4，是一层不导电的物质，通常是环氧玻璃纤维；

多层板通常是2的倍数，用半预制片压合在一起，这种材料也是绝缘的；

对于设计而言，画四层板是最容易的。

PCB表面有一层油漆，叫做阻焊层，用于保护铜线，让其不受空气的氧化；

阻焊层上面还有一层，叫做丝印层，用于标记元件的位置，元件的编号等；

基础工艺指标：

走线线距和走线宽度一般是相同的；

在设计PCB的布局布线中，核心的要点就是要按照信号的流向来进行布局；

在布线过程中，如果走的是信号频率较高的线，需要控制等长；

电路基础知识

  • 芯片附近放0.1uF电容

作用有:

  • 去耦 芯片在运行时, 频繁切换状态会产生电压波动, 电容的作用就是保持芯片电压稳定, 防止芯片工作时对外干扰;
  • 旁路 电源线常有高频噪声, 噪音传到芯片, 会严重干扰运行, 0.1uF电容可以提供低阻抗路径, 将高频噪声旁路掉;

由于噪声一般频率较高, 应该选取更低容值的电容将噪声信号短路到GND, 0.1uF电容值是一个经验值.

  • 盘中孔工艺

当PCB板上接线孔较多时, 可以通过盘中孔工艺来解决, 可以节省PCB板的布线, 还能增强热传导和导电性能;

  • 走线问题

对于功率信号, 普通信号线, PCB走线过长会导致以下原因:

  • 信号衰减和失真, 噪声增加和数据传输错误;
  • 信号延迟, 过长的走线会增加信号传播的延迟, 如高速通信和时序敏感电路, 信号延迟可能会导致系统性能下降;
  • 串扰干扰, 走线过长也会导致信号之间的电磁相互作用, 从而会引入错误的干扰;
  • 增加综合的寄生电容.

元件库导入

原理图绘制

第一次设计以一个stm32最小系统板为设计项目

元件库可以到嘉立创的官网下载；（SMT打样–>可贴器件列表）

一些操作技巧：

  • 双击库中的元件进行选中，左键确定，右键取消，空格旋转；
  • 第一次移动元件按Tab键，可以编辑元件参数；
  • 按住Ctrl再点击某个功能，可以为这个功能设置快捷键；
  • 布线的时候需要点一次右键才能重新画，点两次取消；

设置快捷键去练习

原理图快捷键

  • 右键取消
  • 初次拖动元件Tab修改参数
  • Space旋转元件
  • Ctrl+W布线
  • P+N网络标签
  • P+P放置元件菜单

PCB快捷键

  • q可以将mil单位更换为mm单位
  • 在原理图选择元件之后，点击T+S然后在PCB图中选择T+O+L
  • L可切换元件放置顶层或者底层
  • Ctrl+M测量长度

放置元件遵从的原则：先大后小
先放置大的元件，然后放置小的元件

如何将元件的标号缩小到封装中，

  1. 先对字符查找相似对象；
  2. 在Text Height中将Any改为Same，然后点击应用，再点击确定；
  3. 然后在右边栏中的Properties将Text Height改为35mil，再点回车；
  4. Ctrl+A选中所有元器件，然后右键上方的排列，选择定位元件字符；
  5. 选择居中即可；

四层stm32案例设计

参考资料

  • 学习PCB设计前的知识扫盲，新手向，越新手越好！
  • PCB设计快速入门
  • 嘉立创
  • Altium Designer | 4层STM32开发板基础入门实战课程

entry.title: ROS2入门
entry.content:
安装ROS2

使用wsl2学习ros2, 安装版本为ros2 humble.

在安装过程中, 需要科学上网才能添加gpg公钥, 但是有时候就算翻墙也无法下载, 很有可能是github的一些域名的 DNS 解析被污染, 导致 DNS 解析过程中无法通过域名取得正确的ip地址.

如果忽略这一步继续安装, sudo apt update就会显示如下:

确认能够科学上网之后, 仍然出现Connection refused, 则需要重新添加DNS.

  1. 打开ip地址查询网站:

  2. 输入需要查询的网站名称: raw.githubusercontent.com

  1. 记下这里的DNS;

  2. 打开系统hosts文件

再重新执行一遍添加gpg公钥就可以了.

安装完后进行测试(每次开启之前都要source):

ROS2基础入门

结合项目与Tutorials来学习ROS2会没有那么枯燥, 但开始之前一定要把Tutorials: Beginner的内容做一遍.

设置一下bash就不用每次都要source了

ROS2的基本概念

没有接触ros2或者长时间遗忘之后, 需要通过tutorials复习一下简单的概念:

  • Workspaces
    workspaces是ros的一个基本概念, 通俗来说就是一个工作台, 需要打开这个工作台才能进行ros的开发工作, 最底层的工作空间是underlay, 开发的时候可能会不断嵌套工作空间, 叫做overlays.

  • ROS_DOMAIN_ID
    ros中的domain id用于区分同一环境下运行的不同的ROS2系统,

  • rqt
    rqt是ros2的一个GUI图形化界面, 可以用来进行ROS服务调用和查看它们的响应, 以及查看topics, 绘制数据等.

在Serivice一栏上, 可以调用不同的服务, 最终得到不同的响应结果.

  • Nodes
    Nodes是ros中最基本的单元, 每个node都可以通过topics, services, actions or parameters发送和接收数据.

启动ros2 packages中的节点

查看当前启动的所有node

查看单个node信息

通过--remap来修改参数, 如修改node的名称

此时turtlesim_node改名为my_turtle.

  • Topics

通常一个node会通过发布多个topics来发送数据, 同时也会订阅多个topics来接收数据.

通过rqt_graph可以查看当前的topic, node, service等信息.

从图中我们可以看到/robot_state_publisher这个node, 发布了/robot_description这个topic, 同时订阅了/joint_states这个topic.

查看当前topic, -t显示topic的类型

查看当前topic的类型和发布者, 订阅者

查看当前topic的通信信息

查看当前topic类型的结构

例如通过ros2 topic list -t知道了/joint_states的类型是sensor_msgs/msg/JointState.

可以通过手动发布数据到topic中

例如/turtle1/cmd_vel的数据结构如下:

则可以:

通过--rate 1来设置发布速率为1Hz

查看数据传输速度

查找当前类型的topic

例如

  • Services

Services则是节点之间另一种通信方式, 通过请求和响应的方式进行通信.(call-and-response model) Services只会在node发送请求之后, 才会发送数据.

查看当前的service, -t显示service的类型

service的第一个参数是该service server所在的node, 第二个参数是service的名称.

例如/controller_manager/list_controllers这个service, 其service server所在的node是/controller_manager, service的名称是list_controllers.

查看当前service的类型

查找该类型的service

查看该service类型的数据结构

请求一个service发送数据

  • Parameters

Parameters即为一个Node的参数, 都可以通过设置parameters来设置一个Node, 在ROS2中, 每个node都有自己的parameters.

查看所有node的parameters

查看当前parameters的类型和值

设置parameters

查看该Node的parameters

可以将该node所有parameters保存到一个文件中

例如

将文件的参数加载到node中

在打开节点的同时加载文件中的参数

  • Actions

Actions是一种更复杂的通信方式, 用于长时间运行的任务, 主要包含三个部分: goal, feedback, result.

Actions的通信与Services类似, 它能够持续的发送和接收数据; 其使用client-server model.

action client发送goal, action server接收goal并返回feedback和result.

查看一个Node的所有actions

启动

构建工作空间

ros2使用colcon来构建packages, 需要先安装colcon的依赖

在初始的工作目录下, 通常需要创建一个src目录, 用于存放所有的packages. colcon build会编译src目录下的所有packages, 形成一下目录结构:

在完成src之后, 构建之前需要先安装依赖, 在工作空间根目录下运行

Gazebo入门

由于我使用ros2 humble版本, 这里的gazebo版本为Fortress.

SDF文件的设计

SDF文件(Simulation Description Format)是Gazebo中用于描述仿真的基本物体与环境.

在sdf文件的根目录下, 启动gazebo

ROS2 Control

ros2 control用于控制机器人的底层硬件, 该框架将控制器和硬件进行解耦, 使得需要修改控制算法时, 只需要修改和替换控制器, 如果需要更换硬件, 只需要更换硬件的组件;

源码:

ros2_control的控制架构

Controller Manager

Controller Manager是ros2_control的核心, 它负责提供硬件的控制接口, 并且管理控制器的生命周期.

在控制器的yaml文件中, 通过设置hardware_components_initial_state来列出所有的硬件接口.

entry.title: Research Investigation
entry.content:
RA-L

Dynamic Viewpoint-Based Obstacle Avoidance of Robotic Arms in Complex Environments

北京化工大学
2023
RA-L ISRIMT

这篇文章主要是研究一个移动机器人上的机械臂面对动态变化环境的路径规划，提出了一种局部环境构建策略来改进复杂环境中移动探测机器人机械臂的路径规划效率，通过构建局部环境进行路径规划，从而减少不必要的模型构建，提高避障效率。方法是 the axis-aligned boundary box (AABB) based on octree partitioning for collision detection analysis，通过仿真实验验证了这种方法的有效性。

Nature Machine Intelligence

IEEE

Manipulator Reinforcement Learning with Mask Processing Based on Residual Network

西安电子科技大学
2023.5

该文章采用视觉支持的方法，使得UR机械臂能够在随机环境中学习抓取物体的技能，深度强化学习算法可以有效地学习视觉支持映射，以指导机械臂的抓取动作。为了验证设计的算法，本文在CoppeliaSim仿真平台上构建了一个机械臂抓取系统和测试场景。仿真结果表明，深度强化学习算法结合残差网络（ResNet）可以使机械臂获得较高的目标块抓取成功率。实验结果显示，该方法显著提高了机械臂的抓取效率。

Path Planning for Robotic Manipulator in Complex Multi-Obstacle Environment Based on Improved_RRT

2022.4
IEEE TMECH

本文提出了一种改进的快速随机树（Improved_RRT）方法，用于在复杂障碍环境中为机械臂规划成功且实际可执行的路径。

Improved_RRT方法通过混合约束采样、RRT_Connect与人工势场法结合、自适应引力场、动态步长和新节点约束策略的使用，有效提高了复杂障碍环境中机械臂路径规划的成功率和效率。仿真和实验结果表明，该方法在安全性、路径优化和综合性能方面具有显著优势。

  1. Introduction

介绍了一些传统的路径规划方法：

  • The particle swarm optimization.
  • genetic algorithm
  • APF method
  • A* algorithm

这些传统方法在高维路径中存在一些问题；

However, when applied to high-dimensional path planning problems, they are time-consuming and fall easily into the problem of local minimum.

然后是RRT算法，RRT算法因为大大降低了工作空间中障碍物建模不准确而导致的规划时间成本，因此广泛用于机械臂路径规划中；

但是RRT算法也具有收敛慢，容易陷入局部最优等问题；

后人改良的算法有：

  • RRT-Connect
  • RRT*
  • HD-RRT*
  • PGS_RRT*

改进后的Improved_RRT算法有三个创新点：

  • 采用混合约束采样代替原来的随机采样，得到的节点分布更接近障碍物之间的可通过区域，改进了RRT_Connect方法；

    Using hybrid constrained sampling instead of the original random sampling, the node distribution obtained by sampling is close to the passable area between obstacle;

  • 采用双竞争树和动态目标点，同时提出新的自适应步长和新的节点约束策略，减少了过度的探索和碰撞区域扩展；

    The method of double-competition tree and dynamic target points is used in the expansion. At the same time, an adaptive step size and new node constraint strategy are proposed.

  • 动态运动规划适用于不同的场景，并且优化了算法适用于各种实际场景；

  1. Collision Detection

采用 Flexible collision library (FCL) 进行碰撞检测，FCL是一种高效的碰撞检测库，可以检测机械臂的碰撞。

这个碰撞检测的实现是通过线，点和曲面的碰撞检测；

  1. Hybrid Constrained Sampling

在n维空间中采用高斯混合模型进行约束采样，得到的节点分布更接近障碍物之间的可通过区域，该文章在此基础上再进行了优化，得到了 hybrid constrained sampling.

  1. Adjacent Node Expansion

Standard RRT_Connect 算法的节点扩展速度非常慢

  1. Optimization & Experimental Verification

这一步的优化中解决了三个问题：

  • 路径规划中的局部极小值
    • 通过基于虚拟目标点的方法，使得机械臂逃脱局部极小值约束；
  • 在动态环境下的路径规划，常会遇到动态障碍物和路径中的奇异点，会对路径的稳定性和规划效率产生影响；
    • 改进动态路径规划算法，主要是局部重新规划和双树搜索策略，避免局部极小值点
  • 路径规划过程中可能会生成一些不必要的中间路径点，导致路径振荡，尤其是在起点和终点附近的障碍物区域。
    • 路径规划过程中可能会生成一些不必要的中间路径点，导致路径振荡，尤其是在起点和终点附近的障碍物区域。

改进之后的算法效果

实际实验结果

Optimizing 7-DOF Robot Manipulator Path Using Deep Reinforcement Learning Techniques

IEEE International Symposium on Robotic and Sensors Environments (ROSE)

Machine Learning Department, MBZUAI, UAE

2024.7

探讨了三种不同的深度强化学习（DRL）方法：Deep Q-Network (DQN), Actor-Critic (AC), and Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO)，以优化7自由度（7-DOF）机器人机械臂（特别是Kinova Jaco辅助机器人）的路径规划。

通过仿真验证了这三种方法在静态环境中的路径规划能力。

结果显示，PPO在复杂环境中表现最为优越，能够更稳定地找到平滑的无障碍路径，而DQN和AC的表现稍逊一筹。

entry.title: Presentation Improvement
entry.content:
Using chatgpt to improve my English presentation.

Prompts:

I want you act as an English teacher to improve my presentation. You can give a topic to me. And I will give a paragraph by myself. After that, you must proofread and give advance and more correct expression to my essay. And rewrite it.

💡Activate Code Spell Checker plugins in VSCode

半年左右更新一次。

Robotics in Agriculture

I believe that robots can play an significant role in agriculture. For example, scientists can develop drones equipped with cameras to grow and monitor crops more effectively. These drones can inspect crops in a timely manner, detecting any issues such as pests or diseases. Additionally, they can precisely apply fertilizers or pesticides, thus reducing waste and minimizing environmental damage. Overall the use of robots in agriculture has the potential to increase productivity, reduce costs, and improve sustainability.

Regular Exercise

Ladies and gentlemen, today I’d like to discuss the myriad benefits of regular exercise. It is widely recognized that engaging in physical activity can do wonders for our bodies, both in terms of improving our physical fitness and bolstering our mental health.

One of the most well-known advantages of regular exercise is weight loss. Studies have shown that individuals who engage in regular physical activity are more likely to maintain a healthy weight and reduce their risk of obesity. Moreover, exercise has been linked to a decrease in the risk of a number of chronic illnesses, such as heart disease and type 2 diabetes.

But the benefits of exercise go beyond the physical realm. Regular exercise has been shown to promote better sleep, increase energy levels, and even enhance cognitive function, Furthermore, engaging in physical activity has been linked to decreased levels of anxiety and depression, and an overall improvement in mental health.

In my personal experience, I have found that playing basketball and boxing have had a profound impact on my overall well-being. These activities not only strengthen my body, but also invigorate my spirit and improve my concentration and productivity at work.

In conclusion, regular exercise is a powerful tool for improving our physical and mental health. By incorporating physical activity into our daily routines, we can reap the many rewards of a healthy and active lifestyle. Thank you for your attention.

The Impact of Artificial Intelligence on Health care

Artificial Intelligence is making a significant impact on various aspects of our daily lives, including health care. AI can provide prompt and straightforward preliminary diagnostics when we feel unwell, helping us understand our symptoms and identify potential health issues without having to visit a hospital for minor concerns.

AI also plays a crucial role in monitoring our overall health, offering personalized recommendations for nutrition and reminding us to engage in regular physical activity. In addition to these wellness applications, AI can provide valuable support during times of ailment.

For instance, AI-powered patient care can assist in administering medication and managing treatment plans, as well as offering companionship to alleviate feelings of solitary or isolation. These are just a few examples of how Artificial Intelligence is revolutionizing the health care landscape, improving the quality of care and empowering individuals to take control of their well-being.

The Impact of Technology on Society

Technology has always played a significant role in society, shaping it though changes in the means of production. Looking back through history, we can see how technology has had a profound impact. As we embrace a more convenient lifestyle, technology continues to evolve, constantly influencing and improving our lives.

One recent example of technological advancement is ChatGPT, an artificial intelligence model released by OpenAI a few months ago. Its introduction immediately captured worldwide attention. Futhermore, the rise of AI poses the possibility of certain jobs being substituted in the coming years. This trend is also observed in factories, where robots are gradually replacing human workers. While these developments inspire optimism about increased productivity and efficiency, they also raise concerns and uncertainties.

Looking ahead, it is evident that technology will present greater challenges in the future. However, I remain hopeful that technology, when harnessed responsibly, can contribute to building a happier society that benefits all.

Why Students should be Encouraged to Develop the Ability to Meet Challenges

Develop Students’ Ability to Meet Challenges

In today’s rapidly evolving world, students must be encouraged to develop the ability to meet challenges. This essay explores several compelling reasons why students should cultivate this vital skill set. By acquiring the ability to confront and overcome challenges, students will not only survive but thrive in a dynamic and competitive environment.

First and foremost, developing the ability to meet challenges equips students with the necessary skills to adapt to a changing job market. As technological advancements like artificial intelligence reshape industries, traditional jobs are disappearing, and new professions are emerging. By fostering resilience and adaptability, students will be better prepared to navigate these transitions and seize new opportunities.

Furthermore, in today’s interconnected world, interdisciplinary knowledge is crucial. It is no longer sufficient to excel in a single domain; students must also possess a broad range of skills. The ability to meet challenges encourages students to explore diverse subjects, enabling them to approach problems from multiple perspectives. This interdisciplinary mindset enhance their creativity and problem-solving abilities, giving them a competitive edge in their future careers.

In addition to personal benefits, developing the ability to fave challenges contributes to society as a whole. Individuals who are adept at tackling obstacles are more likely to become proactive and productive members of their communities. They possess the determination and drive to overcome hurdles, effect positive change, and make significant contributions to society’s progress.

In conclusion, it is crucial to encourage students to develop the ability to meet challenges. By doing so, they will not only thrive in a rapidly changing world but also contribute to the betterment of society. Equipping students with resilience, adaptability, and interdisciplinary skills prepares them for the future, enabling them to overcome obstacles and seize opportunities with confidence.

entry.title: Webots 入门
entry.content:
为什么用Webots

到底应该使用哪款仿真器来仿真我的机器人 - 古月居

一言以蔽之，Webots相对而言更加适合移动机器人，同时上手难度更低，更适合作为我们战队的零基础入门学习。之前在战队的时候，尝试推行该软件，由于该软件需要机械组的队员和电控组的队员协作，同时大家也没有学习仿真器的基础。因此很难推行起来。

安装和使用教程

官网安装即可；
Webots: robot simulator

通过官方文档快速学习；
Documentation

Controller in vscode

webots本身的IDE并不好用，而我习惯使用vscode（copilot和chatgpt都帮我写完啦），同时也可以使用两个屏幕写，vscode利用cmake对webots的controller进行编译，从而将controller的代码工作迁移到vscode中。

安装这两个插件，同时安装CMake并且添加到路径：

打开vscode设置，修改setting.json文件，添加以下部分:

建议使用webots的compiler作为cmake的generator;
用Everything打开cmake-tools-kits.json文件，加入以下部分

新建一个controller，选择Webots(gcc/Makefile)，用vscode打开文件夹，删去MakeFile文件，新建CMakeLists.txt，将下列内容直接复制过去即可。

CMakeLists.txt模板：

Ctrl+Shift+P，选择这个编译器（CMakeLists中指定的编译器）

💡在配置环境中，可能由于CMake Tools这个插件的版本不太稳定，导致一直找不到对应的generator，重装该插件之后重启vscode可以解决问题，切忌不要手动安装。

代码完成后，先进行一次Configure对环境进行配置，然后再进行Build编译，修改代码后继续Build即可。

(由于工具链冲突，有可能会弹出配置IntelliSense，选择MakeFile Tool还是CMake Tool，选择后者即可)

最后生成.exe的可执行文件，在webots中选择对应的controller即可开始仿真。

PROTO的制作

Webots里面可以通过创建一个PROTO file来引入一些机器人和场地道具，避免了一些重复造轮子的工作。

Solidworks导入模型

在新版的webots中，不能像往常一样直接导入VRML97模型，导致插入Solidworks的图纸比较麻烦，因此在机器人的设计过程中，尽量通过简化模型，使用webots自带的几何体来进行代替。

入门练习

第一次学习或者很久没使用，应该跟着官方文档的Turorials过一遍。或者哪些内容忘记了，跟着对应的Tutorial过一遍。

Tutorials

麦轮底盘控制器（详细）

由于麦轮建模非常复杂，因此可以拿webots自带的麦轮底盘进行修改。我们这里尝试写一个
controller，使得其可以通过键盘控制全向移动，以此来快速上手。

这个Fabtino本身也自带一个键盘控制器，我们做一个更符合比赛一个控制器。

  1. 创建一个新的项目：File -> New -> New Project Directory...；
  2. 新建一个工程文件夹：D:\webots_project\macanum_control，world name相同；
  3. 勾选Add a rectangle arena；

修改节点RectangleArena "rectangle arena"，使其尽量大一点；

左上添加节点按钮或者Ctrl+Shift+A，添加机器人Fabtino。

修改WorldInfo, 使其适合麦轮的仿真环境。

WorldInfo->contactProperties添加两个ContactProperties；

设置如下：

在webots.cloud中，我们可以找到更多的机器人及其说明文档。

这里写一个简易控制器，来使得麦轮底盘进行全向移动；

  1. 贴标签（和指针一个道理）
    利用Webots中的API:WbDeviceTag对电机或者传感器贴标签，以方便在后续的调试中直接调用。利用wb_robot_get_device函数将标签指定到对应名字的电机或者传感器上（后面统一称为设备）。
  2. 设置位置
    利用wb_motor_set_position()设置四个轮子的位置。
  3. 设置键鼠逻辑

完整代码：

自动避障小车

新建一个project，名字为collision_avoidance，添加e-puck机器人和随地放置一些木箱WoodenBox。

编写controllerepuck_avoid_collision

完整代码如下：

将e-puck机器人的controller替换为epuck_avoid_collision，运行仿真即可。

小车倒立摆模型搭建

在webots中，通常一个机器人是一个Robot nodes, Robot nodes再由很多Solid nodes组成, 不同的Solid nodes由Joint nodes连接而成, 常用HingeJoint来连接不同的solid nodes, 即转动副;

节点关系图如下：

先在场景中创建一个Robot节点, 然后添加其物理属性, 密度和质量更改其一即可, 另外一个为-1

在Robot_children下添加一个Shape, 设置appearance和geometry, geometry选择Box即可;

对shape进行命名, 然后添加boundingObject, 选择USE里面的Shape;

这样就画好小车的主体了:

在Robot_children下添加1个HingeJoint, 添加第一项参数HingeJointParameters, 修改其中的anchor, 作为转动副的锚点;

所有的设计参数都可以参照这个坐标系的尺寸：（在画一个机器人必须先用笛卡尔坐标系对其建模，以方便填写参数）

转动副Anchor设置参考图：

第二项device添加电机RotationalMotor, 修改名字为motor_1;

在endPoint中添加Solid节点, 并对其命名为wheel

Webots的不足

Webots作为一个易用性强，结构简单的虚拟样机，可以针对一些机器人中的运动学和工作规划的设计进行优化，但是缺点也很明显，对于物理属性和材料属性决定的问题，webots的仿真比较无力。例如在解决步兵发射机构和飞镖发射的问题时，任何微小变化的因素：装配精度，温度变化，电机性能等等都会对发射精度产生不可忽略的影响。

对于工程机器人的机械臂的工作空间规划、平衡步兵结构设计与控制算法的耦合测试，麦轮和全向轮的飞坡以及在盲道上的表现，都可以尝试着去进行仿真，在仿真过程中不断修改机器人的结构设计参数以及控制的算法，可以达到一个缩短研发周期和研发成本的效果。

Webots的物理引擎毕竟与现实物理世界还是有较大的差距的，因此仿真的结果不一定与最终的测试结果相同，会存在一定的误差，因此应该根据研发的需求决定是否进行虚拟样机的仿真。

所有的仿真都是在一个不太复杂的工况中通过虚拟样机做近似处理，从而得到一个优化的结果，不能完全依赖仿真，从而忽视了实际测试的重要性。

entry.title: franka_ros2使用手册
entry.content:
Controller Code Review

Joint Velocity Example

在franka的库中, 即joint_velocity_example_controller.hpp中, JointVelocityExampleController这个类定义了三个函数;

  • command_interface_configuration()
    • 用于控制器向机器人输出控制信号, 只包含速度信息;
  • state_interface_configuration()
    • 用于从机器人中读取状态信号, 包含位置和速度信息;
  • update()
    • 控制机器人的运行频率, 可以理解为机器人的”心脏跳动”

代码中JointVelocityExampleController::command_interface_configuration() const {}重写了, 即重新定义了新的函数.

并且调用了ros2_control库中的工具

在controller_interface_base.hpp中的定义如下:

在这个InterfaceConfiguration的结构体中, 构建了一个config对象, 并且贴上了INDIVIDUAL这个标签type, 通过for函数添加名称name;

总而言之, 这里定义了函数command_interface_configuration, 创建了控制接口config对象, 通过config来存储接口的type和name的信息, 将这个config返回控制器, 让控制器知道需要控制哪些接口并且发布速度指令.

同理, 这里也定义了函数state_interface_configuration, 使得控制接口config的状态position和velocity能够从机器人中读取出来.

显然从虚定义中update()需要time和period这两个参数的输入;

  • time表示当前时间, 不需要所以注释
  • period表示距离上一次update的时间间隔

在ros2的controller_interfac_base.hpp中同样有一个枚举类来表示机器人状态, 其命名空间与InterfaceConfiguration相同, 都是controller_interface

因此update()的函数需要返回return_type这种类型来显示结果.

elapsed_time_ = elapsed_time_ + period;用于记录控制器运行的总时间

  • elapse为当前运行时间;
  • 分母time为周期, 代码中定义为8秒;
  • fmod为余数, 分子为当前时间所属周期的起点

上述计算得到了当前是第几个周期, 通过 -1 的 n 次方使得cycle每8秒在 1 和 -1 之间切换, 用来控制方向.

  • 2.0 * M_PI / time_max.seconds()将8秒周期转换为角频率, 即每秒转动多少弧度;

这里通过将余弦波形压缩并向上平移,使其在 0 ~ 1 之间波动, 再通过omega_max限幅.

最终得到的计算结果使得角速度omega会以正弦波的形式加速和减速, 每 8 秒反向一次.

通过command_interfaces_[i].set_value(omega)来控制三四关节的角速度, return controller_interface::return_type::OK;最终返回任务结果, 执行成功.

这里调用了头文件joint_velocity_example_controller.hpp的生命周期回调函数.

ROS2生命周期有几个关键阶段:

  • on_init(): 初始化参数
  • on_configure: 加载配置
  • on_activate(): 启动控制器

控制器启动之后, update()会被周期性的调用.

CallbackReturn是lifecycle_node_interface.hpp, 即ROS2中定义的一个枚举类(enum class), 通常在on_init(), on_configure(), on_activate()等函数需要返回CallbackReturn, 返回类型有两种, SUCCESS和ERROR.

这里通过auto_declare定义一个gazebo的bool参数, 默认值为false, 然后定义一个字符串robot_description, 默认为空字符串, 后续通过python启动的时候, 再传入URDF参数.

auto_declare来源于ROS2中的工具函数, 用于告诉节点需要哪些参数;

根据头文件.hpp中对on_configure的定义, 函数的输入要包括机器人的状态, 但是这里不需要, 但根据ROS2的接口要求必须保留参数类型, 所以给参数添加了注释.

  • is_gazebo从ROS参数服务器获取了gazebo的参数, 其中的参数都通过as_bool()转化为bool类型.

  • 通过auto parameters_client创建一个异步参数客户端, 用于获取其他节点的参数.

  • 通过future变量获取robot_description参数, 其中包含机器人的URDF描述.

  • future.get()会阻塞直到结果返回;

  • arm_id从URDF中解析得到了机械臂名称, 如fr3;

最后通过设置碰撞行为, 约束真实机器人工作时的约束条件.

整个控制器架构

Gravity Compensation

该控制器通过直接控制关节力矩实现, 主要是两个部分:

这里控制器给机械臂输入的指令中, /effort直接给机械臂的每个关节发送力矩参数;

update()在ros2的控制周期负责执行机器人的底层控制逻辑.

  • 由于这个控制器只需要给机器人的关节输入0力矩, 不需要时间和计算, 因此time和period都被注释;
  • auto& command_interface : command_interfaces_用于遍历机械臂的7个关节控制接口;
  • command_interface.set_value(0)设置机器人的关节力矩为0.

Move to Start

通过力矩控制, 使得机器人回归固定的坐标系;

给config配置了力矩输入接口;

通过state_interface_configuration()读取机械臂关节的position和velocity信息.

  • trajectory_time通过指针读取rclcpp::Time的时间戳, 记录从开始运动到现在的运动时间;
  • motion_generator_根据时间trajectory_time生成平滑的关节轨迹.
  • motion_generator_output返回期望关节位置, 即初始位置, 最终储存到Vetor7d这个向量上;
  • finished作为一个bool变量判断机械臂是否已经完成整个轨迹.

这里使用了PD控制和低通滤波;

一阶低通滤波数学公式:

通过低通滤波器屏蔽传感器产生的高频噪声, KAlpha是滤波器的系数, 通常取0.99;

对于一个一阶低通滤波器而言, 系数越大, 系统对输入变化的响应更快, 但噪声抑制能力弱; 系数越小, 系统对输入变化的响应更慢, 但噪声抑制能力强.

对于关节电机的控制, 这里使用了PD控制器, 最终输出关节目标力矩tau_d_calculated:

  • K_p为比例增益, 决定对位置误差的响应强度;
  • K_d为微分增益, 决定对速度误差的响应强度;
  • 通过负号使得速度方向与误差方向相反时提供阻力.

  • q_goal_对应了每个关节的位置信息, 使得机械臂回到安全的初始位置.

  • auto_declare声明ROS2参数.

在ROS2的生命周期中, on_configure在on_init之后被调用, 用于加载实际参数值.

  • updateJointStates()从传感器接口中读取机械臂的当前关节位置q_和速度dq_, 为后续控制提供初始状态;

  • MotionGenerator负责生成q_到q_goal_的平滑轨迹, 确保机械臂运动无冲击, 同时该轨迹生成器需要根据时间推移计算期望位置;

  • on_activate用于准备运行时的资源, 如开始计时，连接硬件等.

Joint Impedance with IK Example

Motion Generator

控制器搭建

package构建

这里以move_to_start控制器为例, 将机器人移动到初始位置;

控制器

在工作空间中新建一个package, 然后创建以下目录:

  • config: 存放控制器的配置文件
  • launch: 存放启动文件
  • src: 存放控制器的源代码
  • include: 存放头文件

controller.yaml

controller.yaml用于controller_manager加载控制器, 需要在该文件中定义控制器的名称和类型, 以及控制器需要要的参数, 该文件存放在config目录下.

重点设置type格式:

前面为控制器的包名, 后面为控制器的类名, 控制器的类名需要在hpp文件中定义并与之对应, 这里定义的类为MoveToStart;

另外, 控制器标识名用于在控制器管理器中唯一标识该控制器, 与类名和命名空间无关, 常用小写下划线命名法.;

move_to_start_controller这个标识名, 后期需要在python启动文件中使用, 传入参数arguments;

还需要启动一个ros2 control自带的节点joint_state_broadcaster, 用于读取关节状态信息.

include目录

在include目录下新建move_to_start.hpp文件, 并添加以下代码:

编译后通过一下命令验证是否加载控制器:

添加motion_generator.hpp文件:

controllers_plugin.xml

该插件用于加载控制器;

  • library path必须和package的名称一致, 方便CMake进行编译;
  • class name为控制器的类名, 结构为package_name/ControllerClassName;
  • type参数与yaml文件中的type参数一致;
  • base_class_type为控制器的基类, 这里为controller_interface::ControllerInterface;
  • description为控制器的描述信息.

控制器代码

在src目录下新建move_to_start.cpp, 并添加以下代码:

同时添加motion_generator.cpp用于生成平滑的关节轨迹:

CMakeLists.txt

python启动文件

franka的启动文件主要由两个文件组成:

  • franka.launch.py: 调用start.py并指定具体功能的控制器. (通常修改这个)
  • start.py: 启动franka基本组件;
